alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 18 at 7:23PM PST until November 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest late tonight through late Saturday morning.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside near large trees. If possible, remain at home during the windstorm and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
